importantArticles.headline: Ericsson (ERIC) and Lenovo (LNVGY) have reached a settlement to resolve their patent licensing dispute over a multi-year, global patent cross-license agreement between the two companies. As part of the settlement, all ongoing lawsuits and administrative proceedings filed by both companies in several countries, including the actions pending before the United States International Trade Commission, will be withdrawn. Financial impacts are expected to be recognized from Q2 2025, reflecting the parti
importantArticles.title: Ericsson, Lenovo settle patent litigation

importantArticles.headline: Ericsson's (NASDAQ: ERIC) financial report for the first quarter 2025 will be published at approximately 7:00 AM CEST on April 15, 2025. The company will issue a press release with the complete financial report attached, including tables, in PDF format. Following publication of the press release, the financial report will be available on Ericsson's website: www.ericsson.com/en/investors/financial-reports/interim-reports
importantArticles.title: Invitation to media and analyst briefing for Ericsson Q1 2025 report
